section.name: FX Rate Calculation
section.p: When you see a rate like EUR/USD of 1.6 / 1.61, it means this:

ul.li: Bid: 1.6; Quoter buys EUR and sells USD at 1.6
Ask: 1.61; Quoter sells EUR and sells USD at 1.61

section.p: If you are on the receiving end, you always end up paying more or getting less!

ul.li: If you want to sell your 1 EUR, you will get 1.6 USD
If you want to sell your USD, you will have to fork 1.61 USD for 1 EUR
